column1: The observer has 3 gauges but only submitted readings for all 3 in the 1890's prior to that he submitted readings for one station, but makes reference to having more than one gauge in earlier records
The full record includes rain gauge 2 from the records as the observer notes this appears to be the most reliable and also covers more years
Separate record sheets are provided for the additional gauges in the 1890s
The Grid Reference is for Middle House in Orleton, where the observer, Mr H Davis lived in the late 1800's
